pages.text: $(li)The Buried Tresure is a hide $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chest$(/l) that can be found over the Overworld with the help of a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/buried_treasure_map)Buried Treasure Map$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/seagull)Seagulls$(/l).$(br)$(li)Inside of this chest can be found $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/iron_ingot)Iron Ingots$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/gold_ingot)Gold Ingots$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/diamond)Diamonds$(/l), the $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/heart_of_the_sea)Heart of the Sea$(/l), and the $(l:patchouli:enders_journey/ender_eyes)Black Eye$(/l).
